name: Emoji Run (UsmanDev)
description:
How to play

WASD to move around

Hold Shift to run

C to slide

Left click to attack

Collect all 10 coins to spawn the boss and defeat him as quick as possible

Install Instructions

- Download the zip

- Extract and run .exe file

Check out how I made it on https://youtube.com/usmandev and join the discord https://discord.gg/tqazGv8FxG to showcase your run. The fastest run get's something special.
